quotes.quote: Be a positive energy trampoline â€“ absorb what you need and rebound more back.
The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
Instead of hating, I have chosen to forgive and spend all of my positive energy on changing the world.
Life gets easier if you choose only to think, act and speak positive energy. Choose to be the light in somebody else's darkness.
Positive energy knows no boundaries. If everyone were to spread positive energy on the Internet, the world would be a much better place.

I believe that positive energy and optimism help us to take up any challenge in life and to succeed in even the most difficult tasks. I also believe that positive energy is contagious: we can transmit it to others.
Today, I will focus on the positive energy I possess, and let the power of love and light illuminate my soul.
If you're not positive energy, you're negative energy.
The positive energy you bring here, makes the world a better place, you know it.
I have a positive energy except when I'm depressed mad or hungry.
People like to be around those who give off positive energy.
There's a direct correlation between positive energy and positive results.
Positive energy is attracted to positive energy.
The positive energy and love we give to others, heals our own wounds.
Surround yourself with positive energy.Good vibes translates into good moods and better health all around.
Without feeling negative energy, we would not know what positive energy is. Acknowledge, understand and give love.
Some people emit negative fumes, while others vibrate POSITIVE ENERGY. Stay close to the Positive ones; otherwise you will be smoked to death.
Happy Friday! You're responsible for the energy of your day. Remember, when you give off positive energy, you attract it ! Decide to be Happy:)!
If you have positive energy you will always attract positive outcomes.
I know that positive energy begets positive energy.
The worst times can be the best if you think with positive energy.
Release positive energy & you will receive it. You have to give people the benefit of the doubt & know that everything happens for a reason.
Energy is equal to desire and purpose.
Everything around us is made up of energy. To attract positive things in your life, start by giving off positive energy.
The longer I live, the more I am certain that the great difference between the great and insignificant is energy - invincible determination - a purpose once fixed and then death or victory.
I've always been able to transform happiness and pain and sorrow and tears into positive energy.
External sources of positive energy and motivation will exhaust, unless we have our captive generation of positive energy.The only sustainable source of positive energy is our thoughts.
Positive energy evokes more energy, more initiative, and more happiness.
If you want to attract positive things into your life, then begin now by spreading positive energy about.
When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple.
